descriptionlist.description: Disables Bluetooth and WiFi after a certain amount of time if there are not connected.

changelog.change: Added the ability to set a timer to disable WiFi when its not connected
Changed prefs so you can disable Bluetooth immediately by making the Bluetooth timer 0
Added "Allow Cellular Changes" which allows Cellular to be enabled/disabled when WiFi is enabled/disabled
If the "Enable Bluetooth when plugged" option is enabled Bluetooth won't disable until unplugged
Fixed the issue when Bluetooth was disabled even when hotspot is on
Added a "Reset All Settings to Default" button
Switched to applist, because sparkapplist was inconsistent
